title: Formoso Cozinha Natural
description: Small cafeteria-style lunch spot in the Sion neighborhood. Run by the same family as Nascente um Gosto de Sol, with a similar cooking style. Uses dairy in many dishes but always has vegan options. Also sells some vegan snacks and take-away items. Note that the space is a stall inside of a large municipal market, located almost directly inside the front entrance.
